```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)

library(ggplot2)
library(uwIntroStats)

# Prepare data
mri <- read_table2("data/mri.txt") %>% 
  select(age, sbp, male, race) %>% 
  mutate(
    sex = factor(male, levels = c(0, 1), labels = c("Female", "Male")),
    race_fac = factor(race, levels = 1:4, labels = c("White", "Black", "Asian", "Other"))
  )

```
